name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bloomberg: Chinese companies and households increased their foreign currency deposits sharply in January, reflecting concerns about the depreciation of the renminbi, especially against the backdrop of Sino-US trade tensions. According to data from the People's Bank of China, foreign currency deposits in China increased by nearly $40 billion in January. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkKY4VPW8AEWWoH.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong media: Xi Jinping held a discussion with a number of private entrepreneurs on Monday. Yesterday, the Internet circulated the summaries of the speeches of six entrepreneurs at the meeting. Huawei founder Ren Zhengfei said in his speech on the spot that although China has made remarkable progress in the fields of intelligent driving and semiconductors, it still needs to be wary of "superficial prosperity covering up internal shortcomings."
 Ren Zhengfei said that the next five years will be a life-and-death window period for China's technology industry, and private enterprises must become the makers of global technology rules.
He also revealed that Huawei has launched "Backup Plan 2.0", joining forces with 2,000 Chinese companies to reconstruct the ecosystem in key areas such as semiconductors and industrial software, with the goal of achieving an autonomy rate of more than 70% for the entire industry chain by 2028.
 Wang Chuanfu, who was also present, believed that private enterprises should actively participate in global competition and expand international markets, and called on private enterprises to pay attention to the training and introduction of talents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump hit back at Zelensky’s comments, accusing him of being an unelected dictator and suggesting he was responsible for the Russo-Ukrainian war.
“Imagine that a barely successful comedian, Vladimir Zelensky, persuaded the United States to spend $350 billion on an unwinnable, completely avoidable war that he would never have ended without the United States and Trump.
The United States has already spent $200 billion more than Europe, whose funding is guaranteed and the United States gets nothing. Why doesn’t “Sleepy Biden” demand balance? After all, this war affects Europe far more than the United States — there is a vast, beautiful ocean between us.
On top of that, Zelensky admitted that half of the money we gave him “disappeared.” He refuses to hold elections, is extremely low in the polls in Ukraine, and the only thing he’s good at is…
fullContent:
特朗普回击泽连斯基的言论，指责泽连斯基是一个未经选举的独裁者，暗示他要为俄乌战争负责。
“想想看，一个勉强算成功的喜剧演员，弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基，竟然说服了美国花费 3500 亿美元，投入到一场根本赢不了、完全可以避免的战争。而这场战争，如果没有美国和“特朗普”，他永远无法结束。
 美国已经比欧洲多花了 2000 亿美元，而欧洲的资金是有保障的，而美国却什么都得不到。为什么“昏昏欲睡的拜登”不要求平衡呢？毕竟，这场战争对欧洲的影响远大于对美国——我们之间隔着广阔美丽的海洋。
 除此之外，泽连斯基承认，我们给他的资金有一半“失踪了”。他拒绝举行选举，在乌克兰的民调中支持率极低，而他唯一擅长的就是把拜登当成傀儡操控，这个没有经过选举的独裁者——泽连斯基最好快点行动，否则他的国家就要没了。
 与此同时，我们正在成功地与俄罗斯谈判结束战争的方案，所有人都承认，只有“特朗普”和特朗普政府才能做到。拜登从未尝试，欧洲也未能带来和平，而泽连斯基可能只是想让这列“送钱列车”继续运行。
 我爱乌克兰，但泽连斯基的表现糟糕透了，他的国家四分五裂，数百万无辜的人丧生——而这一切仍在继续……”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin said he learned on Wednesday afternoon local time that Russian armed forces soldiers had crossed the Russian-Ukrainian border in the Kursk region.
Putin said in an interview at a drone manufacturing plant in St. Petersburg that Russian soldiers from the 810th Brigade crossed the border in the Kursk region and entered Ukrainian territory, and the Russian army was advancing along the front line. He stressed that the Russian armed forces were launching an offensive along the entire contact line.
The Anti-False Information Center of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine denied Putin's statement, saying that the Russian sabotage and reconnaissance team attempted to enter Ukrainian territory and that the sabotage and reconnaissance team had been destroyed.
A spokesman for the General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces also said that the situation claimed by the Russian side did not match the facts.

content: The defendant sentenced to death in the case of a Japanese boy being attacked and killed in Shenzhen did not appeal. The court pointed out that the defendant Zhong Changchun purchased knives to commit crimes in order to gain online attention, which was a premeditated crime. He also took the initiative to contact the media after the incident. His behavior was extremely bad and the consequences were extremely serious. It did not mention whether the Japanese were targeted. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkOFKOXW4AAGSxy.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwan's Minister of Education Cheng Ying-yao said today that China's Huaqiao University, Guangzhou Jinan University and Beijing Chinese Language and Culture University are currently affiliated with the United Front Work Department of China. He pointed out that the Ministry of Education will inform universities today that it is prohibited to cooperate and exchange with schools affiliated with the United Front Work Department of China, including sister schools. If the school violates the regulations, the Ministry of Education will also be held accountable, such as deducting awards and subsidies, and the Ministry of Education will no longer recognize its academic qualifications in the future. As for students who are currently studying in these schools, because they were not informed before and the decree has not been officially announced, during this transition period, the Ministry of Education will consider whether there are relevant relief procedures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The latest Gallup poll shows that Trump's personal approval rating has dropped slightly. In February, his approval rating was 45%, a slight drop from 47% when he took office in January.
After Trump said that Zelensky's approval rating was only 4%, a telephone survey by the Kyiv International Institute of International Studies (KIIS) showed that Zelensky's approval rating was 57%. This is an increase of 5 percentage points from December last year. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkOMx4vasAADJeF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The National Endowment for Democracy (NED) recently released a report saying that China's technological advances in artificial intelligence and data collection, including the emergence of large language models such as DeepSeek, may further intensify Beijing's control over domestic society. The export of these technologies will also provide authoritarian governments around the world with new tools to suppress dissent.
The report suggests that China is technologically advanced in four areas. These four areas are the application of artificial intelligence surveillance, neural and immersive technology, quantum computing technology that can crack encrypted information, and centrally controlled digital currency.
The report points out that China's surveillance system technology driven by artificial intelligence is already at the forefront of the world. These technologies can monitor people's facial expressions, walking postures, and recognize speech, etc. Detailed monitoring of these aspects can help detect possible emergencies in advance. The "city brain" used by China for monitoring during the epidemic lockdown is...
fullContent:
美国国家民主基金会 (NED) 日前发布报告称，中国在人工智能和数据收集领域的技术进步，包括DeepSeek等大语言模型的出现，可能进一步加剧北京对国内社会的管控。而这些技术的出口也会给全球范围内的威权政府提供新的工具以打压异见活动。
 报告提示，中国在四个领域的技术领先。这四个领域是人工智能监视的应用，神经和沉浸式科技，能够破解加密信息的量子计算技术，还有中央控制的数字货币。
 报告指中国在人工智能驱动方面的监控系统技术，已经处于世界前沿。这些技术可以监测人的面部表情，走步姿态和识别说话等等。对这些方面细致的监控，有助于提前探测出可能出现的突发事件。中国在疫情封控时用来监控的“城市大脑”就是其中一例。这个技术也用在监控新疆的穆斯林群体。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's Ministry of Commerce released data on Wednesday: China's total foreign direct investment (FDI) in January this year was 97.6 billion yuan (about 1.34 billion US dollars), a year-on-year decrease of 13.4%. 
Bloomberg quoted data from the State Administration of Foreign Exchange and estimated that in 2024, China's net outflow of foreign direct investment will reach 1227.7 billion yuan (168.4 billion US dollars), a record high. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkOX3JhbkAAOrTT.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Xi Jinping attended a symposium on private enterprises. Blogger "Beifeng" found through sorting that in 2019, China announced the top 500 private enterprises. The second to fifth companies: Suning Holdings, HNA Group, Evergrande have successively filed for bankruptcy. Zhengwei Group also reported that many factories stopped production last year.
Country Garden, ranked seventh, and Gome Holdings, ranked tenth, are also in a state of struggling to survive. In other words, among the top 10 private enterprises in 2019, four have collapsed and two are on the verge of crisis.
"Beifeng" said: Compared with the past 100 years, any country, within a few years, more than half of the top ten private enterprises collapsed, then the country will inevitably fall into an economic crisis during that period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Former British Prime Minister Johnson expressed support for Trump, urging European leaders not to take the US president's accusations against the Ukrainians too seriously, while questioning some of Trump's latest statements.
Johnson wrote on the social media platform X: "When will we Europeans stop vilifying Trump and start helping him end this war? The war was certainly not provoked by Ukraine, and you didn't say that it was the United States that attacked Japan at Pearl Harbor."
"Of course, a country that has been violently invaded should not hold elections. There were no general elections in the UK from 1935 to 1945. Of course, Zelensky's approval rating is not 4%, in fact it is about the same as Trump's."
He defended Trump: "Trump's remarks are not intended to accurately record history, but to shock Europeans and prompt them to take action."
Especially the United States can see that Russia's $300 billion in frozen assets - mainly in...
fullContent:
前英国首相约翰逊声援特朗普，敦促欧洲领导人不要把这位美国总统对乌克兰人的指责太当真，他同时质疑了特朗普的一些最新说法。
 约翰逊在社交媒体X平台上写道：“我们欧洲人什么时候才能停止对特朗普的丑化，并开始帮助他结束这场战争？战争当然不是乌克兰挑起的，你还不说是美国在珍珠港袭击了日本。”
 “当然，一个遭受暴力入侵的国家不应该举行选举。从1935年到1945年，英国没有举行大选。当然，泽连斯基的支持率不是4%，实际上和特朗普的差不多。”
 他为特朗普辩护道：“特朗普的言论并非为了准确地记录历史，而是为了震惊欧洲人，促使他们采取行动。”
 尤其是美国可以看到俄罗斯被冻结的3000亿美元资产--主要在比利时。这些现金可以而且应该用来支付乌克兰和补偿美国的支持。为什么欧洲要阻止解冻普京的现金？美国认为比利时、法国和其他国家在阻挠。这太荒谬了。我们需要认真对待，而且要快”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Weibo celebrity said, "I don't understand why so many people watched Nezha 2 over and over again, and they must make over 10 billion yuan at the box office. The film producers, directors, cinemas and investors all made a lot of money, but what did they make?
A netizen replied: It's a sense of national pride. When you don't have money to buy vegetables, you can eat it with rice. It's very delicious." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkPA7bjbAAE3aRn.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2020, Wang Yuanwai posted a Weibo post questioning Huawei's negative comments on Xiaomi. He was arrested in Shandong in October 2020 and detained for nine months. Huawei believes that the Weibo article has been read by more than 2 million people, which has seriously damaged its business reputation and caused a loss of 13.37 million yuan in goodwill value.
Wang Yuanwai questioned: the evaluation report was falsified, the witness transcripts were falsified, the public security, procuratorate and court adopted illegal evidence, and even suspected of deliberately concealing evidence that could prove the defendant's innocence.
On February 20, Wang Yuanwai said that a policeman came to his house and reminded him to take normal channels to protect his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 19, Nantong, Jiangsu. A man said that his girlfriend was molested by a 70-year-old landlord who broke into her rented house. After his girlfriend resisted and called the police, the landlord left the scene in fear. After the incident, the police detained the landlord for 7 days, but because the landlord was over 70 years old, he was not detained administratively. The landlord even said, "It is a "welfare" of the country that I don't have to go to jail for breaking the law at the age of 70." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkPLueFbUAELXcd.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chosun Ilbo: The captured North Korean soldier Li said that he thought he was going to Russia to study, but he did not expect that he would be sent to the battlefield to fight the Ukrainian army in mid-December after receiving training after arriving in Russia in October last year. In addition, North Korean security officials not only monitor and control the soldiers on the front line, but also lied that "all the drone pilots of the Ukrainian army are Koreans" to stimulate hostility towards South Korea. Li said that now that he has survived a near-death experience, he is 80% determined to go to South Korea and will first apply for refugee status. South Korean Foreign Ministry officials said, "According to relevant laws and regulations, if North Korean prisoners of war request to go to South Korea, South Korea will provide necessary protection and support."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Voice of the Greater Bay Area: The "Hong Kong Democratic Party", an anti-China and Hong Kong-disrupting organization, announced its dissolution today. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkPP_J-WEAAoDX_.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The third anniversary of the "Fengxian Iron Chain Woman Incident". Former journalist and current Beijing lawyer Li Hualiang published an article revealing that "Xiao Huamei" is still receiving treatment in the hospital and has not returned home to live or to her hometown in Yunnan. Local villagers in Fengxian said that their children are taken care of by the government and there are special people to provide security for their lives.
Some villagers from other villages said that perhaps because of the impact of the Xiao Huamei incident, Dongji Village has renovated the road in the past two years, and the appearance of the village has been improved, but the atmosphere is still a little tense. People from other villages go to the village to do business and work, and if they want to enter the village, they will be questioned by the on-duty personnel in the village. Relatives and friends from other places must contact the villagers before they can enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Financial Times: US opposes calling Russia an aggressor in G7 communique. 
The United States opposes calling Russia an aggressor in the Group of Seven (G7) statement on the third anniversary of Moscow's full-scale invasion of Ukraine because it risks undermining the group's traditional show of unity, according to five people familiar with the matter. 
The Western officials said there has also been no agreement on Ukrainian President Zelensky's participation in the G7 virtual summit next Monday. 
The disagreement came after US President Trump accused Ukraine of being responsible for the outbreak of the war, called Zelensky an "unelected dictator" and suggested inviting Russia back to the G7.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Dong Mingzhu said in an interview that when she was dining in a restaurant, she found that the room did not have Gree air conditioners installed, so she asked the boss to scan the code on the spot to place an order.
Another time, a dealer arranged a dinner for guests, and Dong Mingzhu turned around and left after discovering that the hotel's air conditioners were not Gree, "I must find a hotel with Gree air conditioners."
Netizen: If she were the president of the United States, she would require the whole world to use Gree air conditioners, and if not, a 200% tariff would be imposed. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892599569898172416/pu/img/_EKW5arCjVAsbRni.jpg
